title: COVID-19: Vaccine resources
description: Download useful resources and information sheets on COVID-19 vaccine and the rollout programme. These are available in multiple languages.
cleaned_text: Download useful resources and information sheets on COVID-19 vaccine and the rollout programme. These are available in multiple languages. Accessible information [Easy Read COVID-19 resources](/covid-19-novel-coronavirus/covid-19-resources-and-tools/covid-19-information-accessible-formats-and-translations/covid-19-easy-read-information) [New Zealand Sign Language (NZSL) COVID-19 information](/covid-19-novel-coronavirus/covid-19-resources-and-tools/covid-19-information-accessible-formats-and-translations/covid-19-new-zealand-sign-language) [Large print and audio COVID-19 resources](/covid-19-novel-coronavirus/covid-19-resources-and-tools/covid-19-information-accessible-formats-and-translations/covid-19-large-print-and-audio) Translations Visit the Unite Against COVID-19 website to view resources in your language: [Te reo Mori](https://covid19.govt.nz/languages-and-resources/translations/te-reo-maori/) [ | Arabic](https://covid19.govt.nz/updates-and-resources/translations/arabic/) [Te Reo Farsi](https://covid19.govt.nz/updates-and-resources/translations/farsi/) | Fijian](https://covid19.govt.nz/updates-and-resources/translations/fijian/) | Japanese](https://covid19.govt.nz/updates-and-resources/translations/japanese/) | Urdu](https://covid19.govt.nz/updates-and-resources/translations/urdu/) [Ting Vit | Vietnamese](https://covid19.govt.nz/updates-and-resources/translations/vietnamese/) What you need to know about the COVID-19 vaccination Type: Information sheet Audience: General public Last updated: February 2023 Description: An information sheet about what to expect when getting the COVID-19 vaccine. This includes what things to consider, what happens after your vaccine and the side effects. [What you need to know about the COVID-19 vaccination (PDF, 178 KB)](/system/files/documents/pages/hp8590_what_you_need_to_know_about_the_covid-19_vaccination_web_07.02.22.pdf) After the COVID-19 vaccine Type: Information sheet Audience: General public Published: February 2023 Description: The potential side effects after your vaccination, when the side effects could start and what to do. Further information on reporting reactions and who to contact if you are concerned. [After the COVID-19 vaccination (PDF, 3210 KB)](/system/files/documents/pages/hp8591_after_the_covid-19_vaccination_web_07.02.23.pdf) About the Pfizer and Novavax boosters Type: Information sheet Audience: General public Last updated: September 2022 Description: Information about getting a booster COVID-19 vaccination. [Your COVID-19 vaccination: Everything you need to know about the Pfizer and Novavax boosters](/system/files/documents/pages/covd-19-vaccination_pfizer-novavax_boosters.pdf) Protecting your tamariki aged 5 to 11 from COVID-19 Type: Information sheet Audience: Parents and caregivers of tamariki aged 5 to 11 Last updated: 23 December 2021 Description: Information about the benefits of immunising your tamariki against COVID-19 and what to expect from vaccination appointments. [Protecting your tamariki from COVID-19 (PDF, 646 KB)](/system/files/documents/pages/protecting-your-tamariki-covid-19-23dec2021.pdf) COVID-19 vaccine - Pregnancy and breastfeeding Type: Brochure Audience: General public Published: September 2022 Description: Advice about getting a COVID-19 vaccination when you are pregnant, breastfeeding or trying for a baby. [COVID-19 vaccine: Pregnancy and breastfeeding (PDF, 370 KB)](/system/files/documents/pages/covid-19-vaccines_pregnancy-and-_breastfeeding_1.pdf) COVID-19 vaccination consent form Type: Consent form Audience: Parents and caregivers of tamariki aged 5 to 11 Last updated: 9 February 2023 Description: Responsible adults for children under 12 can bring a signed copy of the COVID-19 vaccination consent form to their vaccination appointment. [COVID-19 vaccination consent form (PDF, 243 KB)](/system/files/documents/pages/hp7565_covid-19_vaccine_consent_form_web_07.02.23.pdf) Privacy statement Type: Information sheet Audience: General public Published: 29 July 2021 Description: The personal information we collect as part of the vaccination process and what it's used for.
